summary: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 45382, said ordinance entitled: "An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries and premises and the height and size of buildings; providing for yards, courts, or other open spaces; establishing districts for said purposes; defining offenses; prescribing penalties and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28, 1923; and adding thereto two new sections to be known respectively as Section 2 (ZZ) and Section 17 (ZZ).
